name: Water Park Slide Adventure
description:
Try slides of various heights and thrill levels--learn to navigate them with skill. Be ready for surprising twists and turns

Features:
• Awesome Water Slide Adventures
• Cool city and nature 3D graphics
• REAL physics!
• Ride the slide in 3rd person view
• Exciting & challenging levels
• Coolest water slide simulator with awesome animation
• Creative background music
